column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I woke up early in the morning and walked from my house to the road where the bus travels .
#id=2
#text=This is a busy bus route , so there are a lot of buses I can catch at this spot .
#id=3
#text=I waited 10 minutes and saw a bus in the distance coming my way .
#id=4
#text=I waited patiently at the bus stop making sure the bus driver could see I wanted to board .
#id=5
#text=The bus driver stopped the bus and opened the door for me .
#id=6
#text=I had to wait for some other passengers to get off the bus first .
#id=7
#text=I walked up steps into the bus and paid for my trip .
#id=8
#text=There is a machine that collects money and tokens in front of the bus .
#id=9
#text=Luckily , there was a seat available to sit in .
#text=I rode the bus for about 10 minutes until we were coming close to my stop .
#text=I pulled the string to tell the bus driver I wanted off .
#text=I said goodbye and got off the bus and went to my destination .
